QuestData.Title: Weapons of Destruction
QuestData.Description: The Lich King's lackeys have dared to bring weapons of destruction into my domain. I will not stand for this.$B$BGo to their outpost to the north and destroy the weapons they would use against the land. We cannot let the Scourge taint another inch of these sacred lands.
QuestData.LogDescription: The Avatar of Freya wants you to go to the Death's Hand Encampment to the northwest and destroy 4 Unstable Explosives.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $r. You're proving to be a worthy ally.
